name: @oletizi/audio-tools
description: Monorepo for hardware sampler utilities and format parsers

scripts.backup-and-extract: pnpm --filter sampler-backup backup:batch && pnpm --filter sampler-export extract:batch
scripts.release:publish: pnpm changeset:version && pnpm -r build && pnpm changeset:publish
scripts.release:ship: tsx scripts/ensure-changeset.ts && pnpm changeset:version && pnpm -r build && (git diff-index --quiet HEAD || (git add . && git commit -m "chore(release): publish packages" && git push)) && tsx scripts/create-github-release.ts && pnpm changeset:publish
scripts.release:pre:exit: changeset pre exit && echo '\nâœ… Exited prerelease mode. Next changeset version will be stable.'

author: Orion Letizi
